text.locref: menu_msg_gameover.xml\Message GAMEOVER\ Message GAMEOVER back\Gameover_TEXT\BackPaper - text

picture.name: Message GAMEOVER with Black Background back

text.locref: menu_msg_gameover.xml\Message GAMEOVER\ Message GAMEOVER back\Gameover_TEXT\BackPaper - text

textfield.name: BackPaper - text1

text.locref: menu_msg_gameover.xml\Message GAMEOVER 01\ Message GAMEOVER 01 back\Gameover01_TEXT\BackPaper - text1

textfield.text: TRUCKER CONVICTED OF MAIMING A PEDESTRIAN

textfield.name: BackPaper - text

text.locref: menu_msg_gameover.xml\Message GAMEOVER 01\ Message GAMEOVER 01 back\Gameover01_TEXT\BackPaper - text2

textfield.text: ...Nick Trucking Co is likely to cease existing before long, as a result of conviction of the company CEO, %NICOLAS_ARMSTRONG%, who was found guilty on a charge of inflicting grievous bodily harm with a vehicle.

text.locref: menu_msg_gameover.xml\Message GAMEOVER 02\ Message GAMEOVER 02 back\Gameover02_TEXT\BackPaper - text
menu_msg_gameover.xml\Message GAMEOVER 03\ Message GAMEOVER 03 back\GAMEOVER03_TEXT\BackPaper - text1

textfield.name: BackPaper - text2

text.locref: menu_msg_gameover.xml\Message GAMEOVER 03\ Message GAMEOVER 03 back\GAMEOVER03_TEXT\BackPaper - text2

textfield.text: According to the decree of the US Bankruptcy Court the company "Nick Trucking" is declared bankrupt. All the property of the company will be put up at an auction for repayment of the company obligations to the creditors.

textfield.name: BackPaper - text

text.locref: menu_msg_gameover.xml\Message GAMEOVER_Social\Message GAMEOVER_Social\GAMEOVER04_TEXT\BackPaper - text

textfield.text: Your competitor was awarded the "Trucker of the Year" title.

textfield.name: BackPaper - text

text.locref: menu_msg_gameover.xml\Message GAMEOVER_Economic\Message GAMEOVER_Economic\GAMEOVER05_TEXT\BackPaper - text

textfield.text: Your competitor was awarded the "Gold Carrier" title.

textfield.name: BackPaper - text

text.locref: menu_msg_gameover.xml\Message GAMEOVER_Sport\Message GAMEOVER_Sport\GAMEOVER06_TEXT\BackPaper - text

textfield.text: Your competitor became the California Champion.
